Source.Name: setxkbmap
Source.Summary: X11 client to change the keymaps in the X server for a specified keyboard
Source.Description: setxkbmap is an X11 client to change the keymaps in the X server for a specified keyboard to use the layout determined by the options listed on the command line

Package.Name: setxkbmap
Package.Summary: X11 client to change the keymaps in the X server for a specified keyboard
Package.Description: setxkbmap is an X11 client to change the keymaps in the X server for a specified keyboard to use the layout determined by the options listed on the command line
